column4: a bit on the sweet side
column5: but still good.  Our waitress seriously sucked though.  She moved about as fast as a snail.  But it was okay
column6: because the tapas were good!!  Bacon wrapped dates... my fav!!  There were a few we ordered that weren't out of the world... the sweet potatoes
column8: everything we got was great!  And we have to love yelp... checked in and got a free tapas size dessert!
